channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC Drive Controller CPU 1504D TF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC Drive Controller CPU 1504D TF

item.title: CVE-2024-46886|2024-10-09T14:55:23.979Z -- siemens -- simatic%20drive%20controller%20cpu%201504d%20tf
item.description: The web server of affected devices does not properly validate input that is used for a user redirection. This could allow an attacker to make the server redirect the legitimate user to an attacker-chosen URL. For a successful exploit, the legitimate user must actively click on an attacker-crafted link.

item.title: CVE-2024-46887|2024-10-08T08:40:43.510Z -- siemens -- simatic%20drive%20controller%20cpu%201504d%20tf
item.description: The web server of affected devices do not properly authenticate user request to the '/ClientArea/RuntimeInfoData.mwsl' endpoint. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to gain knowledge about current actual and configured maximum cycle times as well as about configured maximum communication load.

item.title: CVE-2024-46886|2024-10-08T08:40:41.244Z -- siemens -- simatic%20drive%20controller%20cpu%201504d%20tf
item.description: The web server of affected devices does not properly validate input that is used for a user redirection. This could allow an attacker to make the server redirect the legitimate user to an attacker-chosen URL. For a successful exploit, the legitimate user must actively click on an attacker-crafted link.
